device_models: Samsung SUR40; Motorola Xoom; LG Nexus 4
device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
devices_included: Phone; Tablet; Tabletop, large horizontal display
contribution_desc: The paper presents experiments with creating ad-hoc environments for exploring personalised data sets using multiple personal devices. MochaTop enables users to create an ad-hoc tabletop interface using a tablet and connect to it with a smartphone.
